page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: Five of the farms between them{employ} only 3 extra people, except for casual labour at busy times. Much of the work is done by{machine}and these farms have at least 10 tractors; 3 combine harvesters and potato harvesters; 2 ploughs, balers, hay turners, two-axled wagons, and trailers; and 1 corn dryer, rotavator and harrow. Garswood Gate, Stanley Bank and Stanley House were all originally part of{Lord Gerard's}estate, and the farms are about 80 years old. Garswood Gate was probably woodland before being a farm. Florida is over 100 years old.
